metadata.description: Out of the pages of history and into one extremely sick comic book! Prepare to meet Ript and Claude, the Dinosaur Bad Boys of the Jurassic, as they thumb their noses at T. Rex, Brontosaurs, Pterodons...basically anything bigger than they are. They're rude, crude, and have vile personal habits. You've never met anything quite as bad as the Bad Eggs!
metadata.name: The Bad Eggs
